column7: Directed individual creative activity or research. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. 1 to 8 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated if topics vary, in the same semester up to 10 hours; in separate semesters to a maximum of 20 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in Design.

column11: A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message, may be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term.
